title: Yukiya Amano Discusses Atoms for Peace and Development (UNU - United Nations University)
text: ( Source : UNU - United Nations University ) 2015 • 10•14 Tokyo On 8 October 2015 , UNU hosted ' Atoms for Peace and Development ', a public Conversation Series event featuring Mr Yukiya Amano , Director General of the International Atomic Energy
